qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Lexington General Hospital, what are the ages of patients A. Smith and Q. Reyes?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital, patient A. Smith is 12 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital, patient Q. Reyes is 87 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Lexington General Hospital, what are the diagnosis results of A. Smith and Q. Reyes?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital, A. Smith was diagnosed with Acute Schistosomiasis; according to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital, Q. Reyes was diagnosed with Esophageal Malignancy.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Lexington General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, A. Smith or Q. Reyes?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: A. Smith was admitted on October 9th, and Q. Reyes was admitted on August 5th. Q. Reyes was admitted earlier.
